titles.title: A bill to enable projects that will aid in the development and delivery of related instruction associated with apprenticeship and preapprenticeship programs that are focused on serving the skilled technical workforce at the National Laboratories and certain facilities of the National Nuclear Security Administration, and for other purposes.
Department of Energy National Labs Jobs ACCESS Act
Department of Energy National Labs Jobs ACCESS Act
Department of Energy National Labs Jobs ACCESS Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
